summary: add Japanese minor weapons. This does not include katana.
descriptionHtml:
First I\'m Japanese, and not good at English. I\'ll do my best, but please do not expect enough support.
I\'ve used many mods, and appreciate their authors.That\'s why I made my own mod. 
This pack is low quality, but I hope that my gratitude is conveyed.

[Description]
This mod adds several weapons. You can craft at forges, and temper at grindstones.

I won\'t add katana, because there are many  awesome katana mods, and I want you to know 
that there are more minor and interesting weapons in Japan.

# Bamboo Blade 1hd, 2hd, kodachi(dagger)
category wood  
damage steel

These are used in Kendo for practice instead of real katana.

# Houzouinryu Jumonjisou
category steel
damage ebony
weapon type battle axe

This was invented by a monk \"Houzouin Kakuzenbou Inei\".  His  apprentice?\"Insyun\" did combat 
with Musashi Miyamoto.?If you have chance, plesase read a manga \"vagabond?by Takehiko Inoue\".

# Jitte
category... steel
damage... ebony
weapon type... mace
animation... dagger

JItte means ten hands(It is equal to ten hands).
Doushin(police officer in the Edo period) used like a nightstick. 

# Kabutowari
category... steel
damage... ebony
weapon type... mace
animation... dagger

This is a model for JItte.?This is usded for Knocking somebody unconscious or breaking bones. 
This is not main weapon but sub weapon.  Masashige Kusunoki and Jube Yagyu used.

# Kanasaibou
category... steel
damage... ebony
weaptype... war hammer
animation... war hammer

Japanese think that Oni(like an ogre) uses this weapon. \"Oni ni kanabou(synonym)\" is a proverb  means making a strong person even stronger. 

# Masakari
category... steel
damage... ebony
weapon type... war axe

Masakari is a general term about big axes. In an Japanese old tale and a nursery song, 
a boy named Kintaro appears.?He had fantastic strength, mounted a bear like a horse, 
and used Masakari. When he had grown up, he followed Raikou Minamoto and defeated Syutendouji that was the strongest oni in Japan.

# Naeshi
category... steel
damage... ebony
weapon type... mace

Naeshi means losing one\'s energy. You can break bones whether  enemies wear an armor or not.

# Naginata
category... steel
damage... ebony
weapon type... battle axe

Now Naginata is used mainly by women. In the latter term of  Heian period(1180~), 
Naginata was used as a main weapon by samurai and monks. But it gradua??? disappeared 
because spears were selected. Samurai class women learned for self defense. You may think 
Naginata is female weapon and can\'t defeat a man with katana. But please check out Hideo 
Sonobe. She lost only 2 times.

# Sai
category... steel
damage... ebony
weapon type... mace

Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles use this weapon.
You may misundestand that it is a ninja weapon.
It was used by Uhuchiku and Chikusaji(police officer in Okinawa) like a nightstick.

# Bokutou(1hd,2hd,kocachi)
category... steel
damage... ebony

There are many types each style of samurai.
It is used like a Bamboo Blade. But it is heavier and more dangerous.
In the main, it is used to learn Kata.
Kata is a decided process to learn the movement.

# Sasumata
category... steel
damage... ebony
weapon type... war hammer

Sasumata,Tsukubou and Sodegarami are called as \"Mitsudougu\" that means the three items.
These are used to capture criminals.

[Installation]

extract everything into your ...Skyrim/Data directory

[Note]
Jitte, Kabutowari, Kanasaibou

I made them as maces or a war hammer with animation is used when you equip a dagger or a 
greatsword.
On the CK, I selected a keyword \"weaptypemace\" or \"weaptypewarhammer\". 
SkyUI describes as a dagger or a great sword. 
And perhaps perks may not work or incorrect perks work.

v0.2 Kanasaibou fixed

Houzouin Jumonjisou, Naginata,Tsukubou

Their length is about double of nord height. I checked them only with nord race.
For example, when you use breton race, their blades may be buried.  

[Change log]

v0.2 added Sai, Bokutou(1hd,2hd,kodachi),Sasumata
      fixed Masakari texture
      Kanasaibou is now war hammer
v0.1 initial release
